r.d: This PHP extension provides support for the Amazon ION serialization format. https://awesomized.github.io/ext-ion/
r.n: * Improved documentation. * Upgrade bundled ion-c library. * Fix gh-issue #5: ion\Timestamp crashes with string timezones. * Add ion\Exception. * Refactor (un)serialization facilities: * Removed ion\Reader\Options class and moved the options to the ion\Reader constructor. * Removed ion\Writer\Options class and moved the options to the ion\Writer constructor. * Renamed ion\Serializer\PHP to ion\Serializer\Serializer. * Renamed ion\Unserializer\PHP to ion\Unserializer\Unserializer. * Changed ion\Serializer::serialize(mixed $data) to ion\Serializer::serialize(mixed $data, ion\Writer|array|null $writer = null). * Changed ion\Unserializer::unserialize(string|resource $data) to ion\Unserializer::unserialize(ion\Reader|string|resource $data) * Add support for custom (un)serializers.
